properties.Name: Brand
properties.Description: A brand is a distinctive name that is used for identifying a product, service or organization. Brands are often associated with products for marketing purposes.

Columns.Name: BrandId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Brand.

Columns.Name: BrandMark
Columns.Description: The 'brand mark' is that part of the brand that can be recognized - such as a symbol that identifies a company or product.

Columns.Name: BrandTrademark
Columns.Description: A 'trademark' is a brand name or brand mark that is given legal protection.

Columns.Name: BrandLogo
Columns.Description: A design, symbol or series of words that identifies the brand.

Columns.Name: BrandTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Brand Type.

Columns.Name: BrandCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Brand Category.

Columns.Name: BrandOwningPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.
